scripts.node:clean: rmdir /s /q node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.ios:Pod:Reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install
scripts.ios:clean: npm run node:clean ; rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods ; rm -rf Pods ; rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* ; npm run ios:Pod:Reset
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev: npm run setDevelopment && react-native run-ios --configuration Debug --scheme development
scripts.ios:dev-release: npm run ios:clean ; npm run setDevelopment && react-native run-ios --configuration Release --scheme development
scripts.ios:staging: npm run setStaging && react-native run-ios --configuration Debug --scheme staging
scripts.ios:staging-release: npm run ios:clean ; npm run setStaging && react-native run-ios --configuration Release --scheme staging
scripts.ios:prod: npm run setProduction && react-native run-ios --configuration Debug --scheme production
scripts.ios:prod-release: npm run ios:clean ; npm run ios:bundle:assets ; npm run setProduction && react-native run-ios --configuration Release --scheme production
scripts.aos:clean: npm run node:clean & cd android & gradlew clean
scripts.aos:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.aos:DD-apk: npm run setDevelopment & npm run aos:clean & npm run aos:bundle:assets & npm run aos:remove:assets & cd android & gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug & taskkill /F /IM java.exe
scripts.aos:DR-apk: npm run setDevelopment & npm run aos:clean & npm run aos:bundle:assets & npm run aos:remove:assets & cd android & gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease & taskkill /F /IM java.exe
scripts.aos:SD-apk: npm run setStaging & npm run aos:clean & npm run aos:bundle:assets & npm run aos:remove:assets & cd android & gradlew assembleStagingDebug & taskkill /F /IM java.exe
scripts.aos:SR-apk: npm run setStaging & npm run aos:clean & npm run aos:bundle:assets & npm run aos:remove:assets & cd android & gradlew assembleStagingRelease & taskkill /F /IM java.exe
scripts.aos:PD-apk: npm run setProduction & npm run aos:clean & npm run aos:bundle:assets & npm run aos:remove:assets & cd android & gradlew assembleProductionDebug & taskkill /F /IM java.exe
scripts.aos:PR-apk: npm run setProduction & npm run aos:clean & npm run aos:bundle:assets & npm run aos:remove:assets & cd android & gradlew assembleProductionRelease & taskkill /F /IM java.exe
scripts.aos:PR-Bundle: npm run setProduction & npm run clean & npm run aos:bundle:assets & npm run aos:remove:assets & cd android & gradlew bundleProductionRelease & taskkill /F /IM java.exe
scripts.aos:dev-apk: npm run aos:DD-apk & npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:dev:release-apk: npm run aos:DR-apk & npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:staging-apk: npm run aos:SD-apk & npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:staging:release-apk: npm run aos:SR-apk & npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:prod-apk: npm run aos:PD-apk & npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:prod:release-apk: npm run aos:PR-apk & npm run open-apk
scripts.aos:bundle: npm run aos:PR-Bundle & npm run open-bundle
